foreignData.name: Fumulus, l'infestation
foreignData.text:
Vol, contact mortel
À chaque fois qu'un joueur sacrifie une créature non-jeton, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 noire Insecte avec le vol.
À chaque fois qu'un insecte, une sangsue, une limace ou un ver que vous contrôlez attaque, le joueur défenseur perd 1 point de vie et vous gagnez 1 point de vie.

foreignData.name: Fumulus die Plage
foreignData.text:
Fliegend, Todesberührung
Immer wenn ein Spieler eine Nichtspielsteinkreatur opfert, erzeuge einen 1/1 schwarzen Insekt-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.
Immer wenn ein Insekt, Egel, Würmchen oder eine Schnecke unter deiner Kontrolle angreift, verliert der verteidigende Spieler 1 Lebenspunkt und du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.name: Fumulus, l'Infestazione
foreignData.text:
Volare, tocco letale
Ogniqualvolta un giocatore sacrifica una creatura non pedina, crea una pedina creatura Insetto 1/1 nera con volare.
Ogniqualvolta un Insetto, Sanguisuga, Lumaca o Verme che controlli attacca, il giocatore in difesa perde 1 punto vita e tu guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreignData.name: 寄生するもの、フムルス

飛行、接死
プレイヤーがトークンでないクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げるたび、飛行を持つ黒の１/１の昆虫・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
あなたがコントロールしていて昆虫やナメクジやヒルや蟲である１体が攻撃するたび、防御プレイヤーは１点のライフを失い、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 吸血鬼・昆虫

foreignData.name: Fumulus, la Infestación
foreignData.text:
Vuela, toque mortal.
Siempre que un jugador sacrifique una criatura que no sea ficha, creas una ficha de criatura Insecto negra 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.
Siempre que un Insecto, Sanguijuela, Babosa o Gusano que controlas ataque, el jugador defensor pierde 1 vida y tú ganas 1 vida.

mainBoard.name: Fumulus, the Infestation
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying, deathtouch
Whenever a player sacrifices a nontoken creature, create a 1/1 black Insect creature token with flying.
Whenever an Insect, Leech, Slug, or Worm you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: If a nontoken creature is sacrificed to pay a cost of a spell or ability, Fumulus's thirdsecond ability will resolve before that spell or ability. Conversely, if a nontoken creature is sacrificed during the resolution of a spell or ability, that spell or ability will finish resolving before Fumulus's second ability is put onto the stack.
If you sacrifice Fumulus, its thirdsecond ability will still trigger.

mainBoard.name: Heartstabber Mosquito
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Heartstabber Mosquito enters, if it was kicked, destroy target creature.

rulings.text: If a card or token enters as a copy of a permanent, the new permanent isn't kicked, even if the original was.
If a spell's kicker cost was paid, the spell is "kicked."
If you copy a kicked spell on the stack, the copy is also kicked. If the copied spell is a permanent spell, the token the copy of that spell becomes when it enters is also kicked.
If you put a permanent with a kicker ability onto the battlefield without casting it, you can't kick it.
The kicker ability doesn't let you pay a kicker cost more than once.

To determine a spell's total cost, start with the mana cost (or an alternative cost if another card's effect allows you to pay one instead), add any cost increases (such as kicker), then apply any cost reductions. The spell's mana value remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

これでないクリーチャー１体が死亡するたび、血蠅の大群の上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。
